data.title: Lord of Illusions (1995) (Blu-ray)

data.text:
A private investigator hired to protect a popular stage magician finds himself drawn into a dark, occult underworld in this supernatural horror film from writer-director Clive Barker (Hellraiser, Candyman, Nightbreed).

The danger begins for detective Harry D Amour (Scott Bakula - Star Trek Enterprise) when he is approached by a beautiful woman, Dorothea Swann (Famke Janssen - X-Men 2). Dorothea is married to Philip Swann (Kevin J. O Connor- There Will be Blood), a wealthy illusionist who has found fame by disguising real magic as stage trickery and believes that her husband may be in danger.

Harry reluctantly agrees to investigate and he discovers that Swann has made enemies of a bizarre religious cult who wish to resurrect their leader, an evil sorcerer killed by Swann.

Extras:

Disc 2 (DVD): Director's Cut - 104 mins

Director's Commentary

Blu-ray

87

1.78:1 1080p
